com.taskie.api

Interface TaskService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryTaskDao

    public interface TaskService
    Service for all operations concerning tasks.
    See Also:
    InMemoryTaskDao

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void complete(long flatId, long taskId, String userId)
      Marks an existing task as done by a user in a flat.

      Deletes an existing task for a flat.

      Gets all open tasks for a flat.

        Marks an existing task as done by a user in a flat.

      • skip

          long taskId,
          @Nonnull
          String userId)
        Skips an existing task for a user in a flat.
        Parameters:
        flatId - id of the flat
        taskId - id of the task
        userId - if of the user that skipped the task
